alert.note: Alert for Trumbull (Ohio) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Flood Warning issued February 18 at 8:53PM EST until February 19 at 2:00PM EST by NWS Cleveland
info.description: ...Forecast flooding changed from Minor to Moderate severity and increased in duration for the following rivers in Ohio... Mahoning River At Warren affecting Trumbull County. For the Mahoning River...including Leavittsburg, Warren, Youngstown...Moderate flooding is forecast. ...FLOOD WARNING NOW IN EFFECT UNTIL EARLY TOMORROW AFTERNOON... * WHAT...Minor flooding is occurring and moderate flooding is forecast. * WHERE...Mahoning River At Warren. * WHEN...Until early tomorrow afternoon. * IMPACTS...At 11.5 feet, flood waters will spread to Lynwood Drive and Olian Avenue. * ADDITIONAL DETAILS... - At 8:30 PM EST Friday the stage was 10.7 feet. - Forecast...The river is forecast to crest at 11.5 feet shortly after midnight tonight and should then fall below flood stage by late tomorrow morning. - Flood stage is 10.0 feet. &&
info.instruction: Turn around, don`t drown when encountering flooded roads. Most flood deaths occur in vehicles. Additional information is available at www.weather.gov. The next statement will be issued Saturday morning by 700 AM EST.
